title: About: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Discover the Northwestern Libraries. Related links: You can read announcements on our News feed and see updates and interesting stories on the Libraries blog. Publications include Footnotes magazineÂ for library supporters. All News Learn about the Northwestern University Libraries' leadership and structure. Detailed information about our leadership, mission, vision, values and policies. OUR LEADERSHIP Faculty librarian, staff and student positions are available. All gifts, including monetary donations and books and printed materials, make a difference. Visit our staff directory to contact an individual staffer, or provide general feedback regarding our services and systems. CONTACT US TODAY For all press and media inquiries, including student journalism, contact Clare Roccaforte, Director of Library Marketing & Communication at 847-467-5918 or via email at c-roccaforte@northwestern.edu.
